Title: Flighting Battle Pass
Description:
Play to unlock over 30 unique rewards, worth over 10,000 cR (typically takes 30-40 hours of gameplay)! You'll also be given 2XP Boosts and Challenge Swaps to better optimize your gameplay time, and unlock an additional Challenge slot to help you to earn progress even faster!

The Battle Pass unlocks the ability to earn:
- 20 Mk. VII Armor Core customizations
- 2 Mk. VII Armor Coatings
- 1 Action Pose
... and more, all in addition to the free rewards!
